Package com.atakmap.android.maps

Class Polyline

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.FilterMetaDataHolder
      • com.atakmap.android.maps.MapItem
        • com.atakmap.android.maps.Shape
          • com.atakmap.android.maps.Polyline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    URIContent, HashtagContent, Capturable, MetaDataHolder, MetaDataHolder2, VisibilityListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AxisOfAdvance, Circle, Doghouse, EditablePolyline, Ellipse, MsdShape, SimpleRectangle, TrackPolyline, Wedge
    public class Polyline
extends Shape
    A Shape made up of GeoPoints connected by lines and optionally closed

      void setHeightExtrudeMode​(int mode)
      Set how the height is extruded off the shape Mode can be one of the following: HEIGHT_EXTRUDE_DEFAULT Extrude based on shape properties HEIGHT_EXTRUDE_MIN_ALT Extrude off the minimum point elevation HEIGHT_EXTRUDE_MAX_ALT Extrude off the maximum point elevation HEIGHT_EXTRUDE_CENTER_ALT Extrude off the center point elevation HEIGHT_EXTRUDE_PER_POINT Extrude off each point's elevation
      void setHeightStyle​(int heightStyle)
      Set the height rendering style for this shape Example: HEIGHT_STYLE_POLYGON | HEIGHT_STYLE_OUTLINE

      • STYLE_OUTLINE_STROKE_MASK

        public static final int STYLE_OUTLINE_STROKE_MASK
        Adds a thin black outline on the stroke line which increases visual distinction. The outline will retain the alpha value of the stroke color.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • setPoints

        public void setPoints​(GeoPointMetaData[] points)
        Set the points for the polyline. These points have metadata.
        Parameters:
        points - the array of points
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the points is not valid

      • setPoints

        public void setPoints​(GeoPoint[] points)
        Set the points for the polyline. These points do not have any metadata.
        Parameters:
        points - the array of points, cannot be null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the points is not valid

      • setPoints

        public void setPoints​(GeoPoint[] points,
                      int off,
                      int len)
        Given an array of points points, set the sub array defined by offset and length as the points for the Polyine.
        Parameters:
        points - lat/lon/alt
        off - the offset into the points array
        len - the length to be used within the points array.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the points is not valid

        Parameters:

        len - the length to be used within the points array.

      • setHeightExtrudeMode

        public void setHeightExtrudeMode​(int mode)
        Set how the height is extruded off the shape Mode can be one of the following: HEIGHT_EXTRUDE_DEFAULT Extrude based on shape properties HEIGHT_EXTRUDE_MIN_ALT Extrude off the minimum point elevation HEIGHT_EXTRUDE_MAX_ALT Extrude off the maximum point elevation HEIGHT_EXTRUDE_CENTER_ALT Extrude off the center point elevation HEIGHT_EXTRUDE_PER_POINT Extrude off each point's elevation
        Parameters:
        mode - Extrusion mode

      • getHeightExtrudeMode

        Returns:
        The height extrusion mode

        public void setMinRenderResolution​(double d)
        Convenience method for setting the minimum label render resolution.
        Parameters:
        d - the double value set in resolution meters per pixel.

      • setMaxRenderResolution

        public void setMaxRenderResolution​(double d)
        Convenience method for setting the maximum label render resolution. This should be used instead of the original "minRenderScale" because scale is a value that is device dependent whereas resolution is device independent.
        Parameters:
        d - the double value set in resolution meters per pixel.

        Returns:
        the current render hints mask

        Parameters:
        renderHints - the rendering hints to be used.
